components.mentoring.session.previousSes:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to view past mentoring sessions
**UI Location**: Mentoring session page, below the current session details
**When Users See This**: When a student has had more than one discussion with their mentor
**Technical Context**: numPrevious and sessions must remain unchanged. numPrevious: number of previous sessions; sessions: pluralized 'session' string.
**Current English**: "See {numPrevious} previous {sessions}"

**Functional Purpose**: Alternative text for an icon indicating a link opens a modal
**UI Location**: Next to the 'See previous sessions' link
**When Users See This**: When the 'See previous sessions' link is visible and its associated icon is rendered
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Opens in modal"
components.mentoring.session.automatedFe:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the automated analysis section within the modal
**UI Location**: Automated Feedback Modal header
**When Users See This**: When the Automated Feedback Modal is opened
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Automated Analysis"

**Functional Purpose**: Sub-heading indicating which iteration the automated analysis is for
**UI Location**: Automated Feedback Modal header, below the main heading
**When Users See This**: When the Automated Feedback Modal is opened
**Technical Context**: iteration must remain unchanged. iteration: the index of the iteration.
**Current English**: "for Iteration {iteration}"

**Functional Purpose**: Alt text for a loading spinner indicating automated feedback is being loaded
**UI Location**: Automated Feedback Modal, when content is loading
**When Users See This**: While the automated feedback data is being fetched and displayed in the modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Loading automated feedback"
